data.title: A Complete Timeline of Beyonc√© and Jay-Z's Relationship
data.meta_description: Beyonc√© and Jay-Z have been together for over 20 years, and their relationship has produced a family and more art than anyone could have anticipated. Here, their history.
data.text:
Beyonc√© and Jay-Z have been together for over 20 years, and their relationship has produced more art than anyone could have anticipated. They've also created three children, Blue Ivy, who was born in 2012, and their twins Rumi and Sir, born in 2017.

The couple is very thoughtful about what they share from their marriage and family, but a lot of it comes through their music and their travels and tours across the world. Here's all the big moments from their long, loving relationship.

2000

Beyonc√© told Seventeen that she met Jay-Z when she was 18, but they began dating about a year and a half later, when she was 19 years old. The rapper is 12 years older than his wife.

‚ÄúWe were friends first for a year and a half before we went on any dates,‚Äù the pop icon told Oprah Winfrey in an OWN interview. "We were on the phone for a year and a half, and that foundation is so important for a relationship. Just to have someone who you just like is so important, and someone [who] is honest."

November 2001

The couple are put on the cover of Vanity Fair's November 2001 music issue. Jay-Z later told the magazine that at the time of the cover they ‚Äúwere just beginning to try to date each other.‚Äù

He added, ‚ÄúWell, you know, you've got to try first. You got to dazzle... wine and dine...She's a charming Southern girl, you know, she's not impressed... But I would have definitely had to be this cool.‚Äù

October 2002

The two collaborate on Jay-Z's track ‚Äú'03 Bonnie & Clyde‚Äù featuring Beyonc√©'s vocals and filming a music video together in Mexico.

May 2003

They do a switcheroo, and Beyonc√© releases the song ‚ÄúCrazy in Love‚Äù featuring Jay-Z. They win a Grammy for Best R&B Song and Best Rap/Sung Collaboration in 2004. At this point, their relationship still wasn't official, though fans and followers assume they're together.

August 2004

Beyonc√© and Jay-Z make their red carpet debut at the MTV VMAs in Miami, and each win an award.

September 2006

Beyonc√© releases her B'Day album and Jay-Z is again her collaborator, appearing in ‚ÄúD√©j√† Vu‚Äù and ‚ÄúUpgrade U.‚Äù

November 2006

The rapper releases Kingdom Come and Beyonc√© is heard on ‚ÄúHollywood.‚Äù

April 2008

On April 4, 2008, Beyonc√© and Jay-Z get married in very secretive and intimate ceremony.

‚ÄúIt was a very emotional wedding‚Äîlots of crying‚Äîand really very spiritual,‚Äù a source told People at the time, saying it was held at the rapper's Manhattan penthouse, and they decorated the luxurious apartment with 70,000 dendrobium orchids flown in from Thailand for the event.

‚ÄúThere was no rush‚Äîno one expected me to run off and get married,‚Äù Beyonc√© later told Seventeen of her big day. ‚ÄúI really don't believe that you will love the same thing when you're 20 as you do at 30. So that was my rule: Before the age of 25, I would never get married. I feel like you have to get to know yourself, know what you want, spend some time by yourself, and be proud of who you are before you can share that with someone else.‚Äù

August 2008

In an interview with Vibe, Jay-Z finally confirmed their wedding ceremony.

‚ÄúThat's ridiculous for me to confirm,‚Äù he explained. ‚ÄúI don't have ‚Ä¶ I'm gonna say, I think that was a ridiculous question. I just think it's really a part of your life that you gotta keep to yourself ‚Ä¶ You have to, or you'll go insane in this type of business. You have to have something that's sacred to you and the people around you ‚Ä¶ I shared so much of my life, my childhood, and my family, the death of my nephew with the world. I should have something to hold on to. You need something for your sanity to say, ‚ÄòOkay, I could chill out, and this is it.‚Äô‚Äù

October 2008

Beyonc√© and Jay-Z share that they have matching tattoos of the Roman numeral IV on their ring fingers, which is significant because Beyonc√© was born on September 4; Jay-Z on December 4; and they were married on April 4.

November 2008:

Beyonc√© tells Seventeen what she's learned from her relationship so far, saying, ‚ÄúI guess probably that we're all human. I don't care if you're picture-perfect on every magazine cover, and you're the most handsome, successful, coolest guy‚Äîyou still get sad, and you still get your feelings hurt, and you still get confused and vulnerable and nervous and scared. You have to find a person you can make it through the tough times with.‚Äù

January 2009

The couple were in attendance at the inauguration of President Obama's first term in the White House, and Beyonc√© contributed her talent to sing him in, starting with ‚ÄúAmerica the Beautiful‚Äù at his swearing-in ceremony followed by Etta James' ‚ÄúAt Last‚Äù as Barack and Michelle Obama shared their first dance at his inaugural ball.

August 2011

The couple revealed that they're expecting at the MTV VMAs in Los Angeles. Beyonc√© wore an outfit revealing her baby bump. When she took to the stage to perform ‚ÄúLove on Top,‚Äù she told the audience, ‚ÄúI want you to stand up on your feet. I want you to feel the love that's growing inside me.‚Äù

In her 2013 HBO documentary Life Is But a Dream, she revealed that Blue Ivy was not her first pregnancy.

‚ÄúAbout two years ago, I was pregnant for the first time,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúAnd I heard the heartbeat, which was the most beautiful music I ever heard in my life ‚Ä¶ Being pregnant was very much like falling in love. You are so open. You are so overjoyed. There's no words that can express having a baby growing inside of you, so of course you want to scream it out and tell everyone.... I flew back to New York to get my check up‚Äîand no heartbeat. Literally the week before I went to the doctor, everything was fine, but there was no heartbeat.‚Äù

January 2012

Blue Ivy Carter is born to the couple on January 7, 2012 in New York City.

February 2012

Beyonc√© and Jay-Z share the first pics of Blue Ivy on Beyonc√©'s Tumblr, the popular mode of communication at the time.

‚ÄúWe welcome you to share in our joy. Thank you for respecting our privacy during this beautiful time in our lives,‚Äù they wrote.

January 2013

The married couple are present for President Obama's second inauguration as well, where she sings ‚ÄúThe Star-Spangled Banner.‚Äù

February 2013

Beyonc√©'s Life Is But a Dream documentary is released, sharing details of their life that haven't been seen before, like Beyonc√©'s early pregnancy days.

July 2013

Magna Carta Holy Grail is released, including the track ‚ÄúPart II (On the Run)‚Äù in which Jay-Z duets with his wife.

December 2013

Beyonc√©'s iconic self-titled album was released, making it a full visual album for all 14 songs, which included her massive hit ‚ÄúDrunk in Love‚Äù with Jay-Z.

January 2014

The couple perform ‚ÄúDrunk in Love‚Äù at the Grammy Awards, looking like they definitely are smitten.

May 2014

The silent fight that shook the world takes place: footage of Jay-Z, Beyonc√©, and her sister Solange on an elevator after the annual Met Gala shows Solange attacking Jay-Z following some sort of argument. No one from the family has ever confirmed what the instigating issue was, but tabloids reported it was over cheating rumors.

They did release a statement saying, ‚ÄúThere has been a great deal of speculation about what triggered the unfortunate incident. But the most important thing is that our family has worked through it. Jay and Solange each assume their share of responsibility for what has occurred. They both acknowledge their role in this private matter that has played out in the public. They both have apologized to each other and we have moved forward as a united family. The reports of Solange being intoxicated or displaying erratic behavior throughout that evening are simply false. At the end of the day families have problems and we're no different. We love each other and above all we are family. We've put this behind us and hope everyone else will do the same.‚Äù

June 2014

On June 25, Jay-Z and Beyonc√© kick off their On the Run Tour in Miami that runs for 21 dates. That same summer, they are plagued by rumors of a split.

August 2014

On August 24, Beyonc√© receives the MTV Video Vanguard Award, which is presented to her by her husband and their daughter Blue Ivy.

‚ÄúThank you. I have nothing to say, but I'm thrilled with so much gratitude,‚Äú she said in her acceptance speech. ‚ÄúI just thank God for this moment. I love y'all so much," she tearfully told the crowd. "My beloved, I love you. My fans, I love you. MTV, I love you. Good night!‚Äù

In her new remix of ‚Äú***Flawless‚Äù with Nicki Minaj, she says, ‚ÄúOf course sometimes sh*t go down when it's a billion dollars on the elevator,‚Äù seemingly referencing the incident from May.

That same month, Solange is asked about the fight in her Lucky cover story, calling it ‚Äúthat thing.‚Äù

‚ÄúWhat's important is that my family and I are all good,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúWhat we had to say collectively was in the statement that we put out, and we all feel at peace with that.‚Äù

October 2014

For Halloween, Beyonc√© dresses up as Janet Jackson, and Blue Ivy is a little Michael Jackson.

November 2014

Solange marries her fianc√© Alan Ferguson on November 16 in New Orleans, and Beyonc√©, Jay-Z, and Blue Ivy all attend. A couple weeks later, Beyonc√© releases ‚ÄúRing Off,‚Äù which was about the end of her parents' marriage in 2009. It did seem to fuel rumors about a possible end to her marriage with Jay-Z.

April 2015

In an Instagram video that has long since been deleted along with his entire account, Jay-Z shared private footage of their vow exchange, which was shown once before at Miami‚Äôs Sun Life Stadium during the opening night of their ‚ÄúOn the Run‚Äù tour.

May 2015:

One year after ‚Äúthe incident,‚Äù Beyonc√©, Jay-Z, and Solange all attend the Met Gala in New York City together.

February 2016:

Beyonc√© performs with Bruno Mars, Chris Martin, and the rest of Coldplay at the Super Bowl Halftime show.

April 2016

On April 23, Beyonc√© releases Lemonade album in conjunction with her HBO special of visuals. The album seems to be about her marriage, and the difficulties they've encountered after fifteen years together, including infidelity and her journey to forgiveness.

On April 27, Beyonc√© begins her Formation World Tour in Miami and dedicates her song ‚ÄúHalo‚Äù to her ‚Äúbeautiful husband.‚Äù

Beyonc√©'s mom Tina Knowles Lawson said of Lemonade, saying, ‚ÄúIt could be about anyone's marriage. I think that everybody at one time or another has been betrayed and lied to and it's about the pain and it's about the healing process and it's about, ‚ÄòHow do you get past that and move on.‚Äô‚Äù

May 2016

Beyonc√© attends the Met Gala solo, just over a week after the release of Lemonade. Shortly after that, Fat Joe and Remy Ma release a remix of ‚ÄúAll the Way Up‚Äù featuring Jay-Z.

On the track, he raps, ‚ÄúYou know you made it when the fact your marriage made it is worth millions / Lemonade is ‚Ä¶ a popular drink and it still is.‚Äù

August 2016

Beyonc√© performed at MTV VMAs solo, but accompanied by Blue Ivy. She won the Video of the Year award, along with seven others, and performed a medley from Lemonade. Jay-Z met up with his wife at an after-party, along with friends at the time, Kanye West and Kim Kardashian.

October 2016

On October 7, Jay-Z performs at the final show of Beyonc√©'s Formation World Tour in New Jersey. For Halloween that month, they wear a Barbie and Ken couples costume.

November 2016

Beyonc√© and Jay-Z support Hillary Clinton at a rally in Cleveland just before the election. At the end of the month, Beyonc√© releases a video for ‚ÄúAll Night,‚Äù featuring footage from her wedding.

December 3, 2016

Beyonc√© throws her husband a surprise birthday party on December 3 in Los Angeles, attended by Kelly Rowland and Tina Knowles Lawson.

February 2017

On February 1, the couple share that they are expecting twins, writing on a post of Beyonc√©'s pregnancy reveal surrounded by flowers, ‚ÄúWe would like to share our love and happiness. We have been blessed two times over. We are incredibly grateful that our family will be growing by two, and we thank you for your well wishes. ‚Äì The Carters.‚Äù

They attended the Grammys later that month, where Beyonc√© performed pregnant once again.

June 2017

Beyonc√© and Jay-Z welcome their twins in mid-June, Rumi and Sir. Later on, Jay-Z releases his 13th solo studio album, 4:44. In it, he raps about his relationships and past infidelities.

‚ÄúI apologize, our love was one for the ages and I contained us,‚Äù he says in the lyrics. ‚ÄúAnd if my children knew, I don't even know what I would do / If they ain't look at me the same / I would prolly die with all the shame.‚Äù

August 2017

The couple buy an $88 million Bel Air mansion and get cozy with their new family additions.

September 2017

The couple start the month in Philadelphia at the Made in America festival, and Jay-Z has the crowd sing ‚ÄúHappy Birthday‚Äù to Beyonc√© just before she turned 36.

A few weeks later, they make their first red carpet appearance since the birth of their twins at pal Rihanna's Diamond Ball in New York at Cipriani.

That month they also take Blue Ivy to a Bruno Mars concert at Madison Square Garden, and purchase a home in the Hamptons on the beach for $26 million.

October 2017

Jay-Z headlines his third annual Tidal x Brooklyn benefit concert, which raised money victims of Hurricanes Harvey and Irma. Beyonc√© was in the audience, but she did not perform.

November 2017

On November 29, released an interview with Jay-Z in which he admitted to infidelity, and explained how he and Beyonc√© repaired their relationship, in some part through her music.

‚ÄúYou know, most people walk away, and like divorce rate is like 50 percent or something 'cause most people can't see themselves,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúThe hardest thing is seeing pain on someone's face that you caused, and then have to deal with yourself. So, you know, most people don't want to do that. You don't want to look inside yourself. And so you walk away.‚Äù

The rapper said he went to therapy to help deal with some of these issues, and that both Lemonade and 4:44 are about their marital strife. He added that listening to those albums was ‚Äúvery, very uncomfortable,‚Äù but added, ‚ÄúWe were using our art almost like a therapy session.‚Äù

January 2018

Jay-Z was nominated for eight Grammys, and attended Clive Davis and the Recording Academy's annual pre-Grammys gala in New York. The rapper received the 2018 Salute to Industry Icons Award. At the Grammys that night, they were joined front row by Blue Ivy.

Before the event, Jay-Z sat down for an interview with CNN's Van Jones, where he again talked about cheating, saying that ‚Äúthe best apology is changed behavior,‚Äù and that the ‚Äúother side is beautiful‚Äîat least for us.‚Äù

He also shared more info about the twins, who were seven months old at the time.

‚ÄúWe are in a beautiful time now because they are seven months and they can't move,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúThey can just coo ‚Ä¶ they just coo and you don't have to ‚Äòwait, wait, wait, wait.‚Äô ‚Ä¶ You know, they're not running anywhere yet. We are going to enjoy these couple of months until they start running, and then it's over.‚Äù

March 2018

The couple collaborate again, this time appearing on ‚ÄúTop Off‚Äù by DJ Khaled.

Mid-month, they announce their On the Run II Tour, much to the excitement of fans. A few days later, they attend the annual Wearable Art Gala thrown by Tina Knowles Lawson, along with their eldest daughter, who bid at the live auction. Blue Ivy ended up bidding $17,000 on a painting of Sidney Poitier, according to Vanity Fair.

The piece eventually went to director Tyler Perry for $20,000.

April 2018

Beyonc√© performs her iconic Coachella set.

June 2018

On June 6, the couple begin their On the Run II Tour in Cardiff, England. The show included footage from a vow renewal ceremony, with the the words ‚ÄúTHIS IS REAL LOVE‚Äù as they sing their duet from 2009, ‚ÄúYoung Forever.‚Äù

On June 16, they release a shared album, Everything Is Love, with nine-tracks by ‚ÄúThe Carters.‚Äù

Visuals for ‚ÄúApesh*t‚Äù were released the same day and shot by Ricky Saiz at The Louvre in Paris. They announced the album in London during a concert, and Beyonc√© told the crowd at the time, ‚ÄúYou've all given so much love every time we come here‚Äîthank you. Because we love you all so much we have something special for y'all," Beyonc√© said. "We want you guys to be the first to experience this new project. And we have a new visual for you guys.‚Äù

She then counted them down to the video playing.

July 2018

After 18 shows in Europe, they stopped for a little break from the On the Run II Tour in Italy, chilling on a yacht before heading to the U.S. for the domestic leg of their tour.

September 2018

The couple headed back to Italy to celebrate Beyonc√©'s 37th birthday in Sardinia.

On a collection of photos from her party weekend, Beyonc√© wrote, ‚ÄúAt 36, I became a new mother of 3. I breastfed twins. I renewed my vows with my husband of ten years. I came back home to the stage to do Coachella, after pregnancy. Then my husband and I released our album together, Everything Is Love. And we‚Äôve been touring with our family around the world, and loving it. This year has been monumental for me. I thank God for everyone in my life. Thank you for all the positivity and for the beautiful birthday wishes.

I‚Äôm looking forward to continuing to learn from my past, living in the present, and surrendering to the future.‚Äù

February 2019

The couple's album Everything Is Love won best urban contemporary album at the 2019 Grammy Awards.

March 2019

The NAACP Image Awards honor both of them, with Beyonc√© receiving the entertainer of the year trophy, and Jay-Z taking home the president's award.

April 2019

People reports that for their 11th wedding anniversary, the pair enjoyed a ‚Äúno-kids‚Äù trip in Mexico.

‚ÄúRight after the tour ended, they took it easy,‚Äù a source said at the time. ‚ÄúThey were both beyond excited about how the tour went, but they were also tired. They just needed a little break and are back to talking about new projects.‚Äù

January 2020

The couple are noted for bringing their own champagne to the 2020 Golden Globes, Armand de Brignac, which is co-owned by the rapper.

June 2021

Beyonc√© and Jay-Z attend the NBA Playoffs Game 1 between the Brooklyn Nets and the Milwaukee Bucks at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn. The Brooklyn Nets are formerly co-owned by the rapper, and they wore the team's colors to show their support.

September 2021

The pair team up with Tiffany & Co. for the diamond company's ABOUT LOVE advertising campaign, writing in a statement, ‚ÄúLove is the diamond that the jewelry and art decorate.‚Äù

In the ad, Beyonc√© wore a long black dress reminiscent of Audrey Hepburn's look in the film Breakfast at Tiffany's, and she recorded a cover of the film's song ‚ÄúMoon River.‚Äù

November 2021

For the second time, Jay-Z joined Instagram to promote the 2021 Netflix film he co-produced, The Harder They Fall. He only followed Beyonc√© before deleting his account a day later.

February 2022

Beyonc√© attended Super Bowl LVI with her husband and oldest daughter at SoFi Stadium in Los Angeles.

March 2022

Beyonc√©'s song ‚ÄúBe Alive‚Äù from the film King Richard is nominated for an Academy Award, and she opens the show by singing her hit in a pre-recorded performance on a tennis court.

For the night, she wore a tennis ball-shaped purse as a way to honor the film's story about the success of Serena and Venus Williams and their coach father.

July 2022

Beyonc√© releases her new album, Renaissance. It's an immediate hit.

October 2022

Beyonc√© and Jay-Z attend the Wearable Art Gala, hosted by Tina Knowles.

They make more wearable art for Halloween, dressing up as The Proud Family.

November 2022

Beyonc√© receives nine Grammy Award nominations, reaching 88 total throughout her career. She and Jay-Z tie for the most-nominated artist in Grammy history.

The nominations for Renaissance include: Record of the Year, Song of the Year for ‚ÄúBreak My Soul,‚Äù and Album of the Year, Best R&B Song for ‚ÄúCuff It,‚Äù R&B Performance for ‚ÄúVirgo‚Äôs Groove,‚Äù Traditional R&B Performance for ‚ÄúPlastic Off the Sofa,‚Äù Best Dance/Electronic Recording for ‚ÄúBreak My Soul,‚Äù and Best Dance/Electronic Album.

January 2023

In her first live show since 2018, Beyonc√© performed at the Atlantis the Royal hotel in Dubai, with her daughter Blue Ivy on stage to sing along with her. The star performed 19 songs after reportedly being paid $24 million for her appearance. It was said that the singer didn't do any of her songs from her most recent album Renaissance, but she did sing her classic hits ‚ÄúHalo‚Äù and ‚ÄúCrazy in Love.‚Äù

Blue Ivy joined for the live debut ‚ÄúBROWN SKIN GIRL,‚Äù the original song created for the soundtrack of the live-action film The Lion King: The Gift.

When the song was released, Blue Ivy was credited as a songwriter, appeared in the video, and had her vocals on the track, but this is the first time the mother-and-daughter duo have performed it together or live. Fans captured clips of the momentous occasion.

July 2023

Jay-Z has been a supportive husband throughout Beyonc√©'s Renaissance world tour, traveling with her and attending her shows. But the support goes both ways: Beyonc√© shared photos of her and the couple's oldest daughter Blue Ivy Carter at the grand opening of Jay-Z's The Book of HOV exhibition at the Brooklyn Public Library. Naturally, Beyonc√© included a shot of the man of the hour alongside her in an elevator to boot.

November 2023

Thursday, November 30, was the London premiere of Beyonc√© Renaissance film, and after the main event she spent the evening out with husband Jay-Z wearing a stunning diamond and pearl encrusted minidress with a massive sparkling breastplate. She also briefly wore a coat over the ensemble as she walked through the street, with only the plate sticking out of the front.

The Grammy winner shared a carousel of images displaying the look at its full power, wearing her blonde hair half up, and donning black opera gloves and black heels. In some of the pictures, Jay-Z and his tuxedo can be seen by her side at dinner. They were eventually photographed leaving Harry‚Äôs Bar in London Mayfair.

December 2024

Beyonc√© and Jay-Z headed to Brazil for a special screening of her film in Salvador, Brazil. She greeted them from the stage at a ‚ÄúClub Renaissance‚Äù after-party following the group seeing Renaissance: A Film by Beyonc√©. In videos posted on X, formerly known as Twitter, the crowd goes wild as she speaks to them.

‚ÄúI came because I love you so much,‚Äù she says. ‚ÄúIt was very important to me to be here‚Äî right here in Bahia. The renaissance is about freedom. It‚Äôs about beauty, joy, resilience, everything that you are about. I‚Äôm so honored to be here and so happy to see your beautiful faces. I love you so much.‚Äù

She added, ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs nobody like y‚Äôall. You are one of one. Number one and the only one, Bahia!‚Äù

January 2024

The couple attended LeBron James‚Äô Studio 84 themed birthday party.

February 2024

During the 2024 Grammys ceremony, Jay-Z accepted the second-ever Dr. Dre Global Impact Award, and seemed to call out the Grammys for the way they have continually snubbed his wife's chart-topping music.

He started by mentioning his own nomination for Best Rap Album in 1998, the same year DMX dropped two albums, but received no nominations.

‚ÄúSo I boycotted,‚Äù he continued, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm just saying: We want [the Grammys] to get it right. We love y‚Äôall, we love y‚Äôall, we want y‚Äôall to get it right. At least get it close to right. And obviously it‚Äôs subjective. Obviously it‚Äôs subjective because, you know, it‚Äôs music and it‚Äôs opinion-based. But some things, you know.‚Äù

He continued, ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt want to embarrass this young lady [Beyonc√©], but she has more Grammys than everyone, and never won Album of the Year. So even by your own metrics, that doesn‚Äôt work. Think about that: the most Grammys, never won Album of the Year. That doesn‚Äôt work... Some of you gonna go home tonight and feel like you‚Äôve been robbed; some of you may get robbed. Some of you don‚Äôt belong in the category. No, when I get nervous, I tell the truth.‚Äù

She laughed from the audience.

A few weeks later on February 20, Beyonc√© expanded her business enterprises with C√©cred, a hair product brand. In a rare interview with Essence Magazine, she talked about becoming a mother and how she cut off her hair in 2013.

‚ÄúI remember the day I decided to just cut all my hair off,‚Äù Beyonc√© began. ‚ÄúI didn‚Äôt have a particular style in mind. It wasn‚Äôt an aesthetic choice, but it was a very big emotional transformation and metamorphosis that I was going through. So much of my identity as a performer has been connected to flowing hair. Cutting my hair off was me rebelling against being this woman that society thinks I‚Äôm supposed to be.‚Äù

She went on, ‚ÄúI was a new mother, and something about the liberation of becoming a mother made me want to just shed all of that. It was a physical representation of me shedding the expectations put upon me. I just wanted it off. Neal Farinah, my hairstylist and friend, was freaking out because it was really long, really thick and really healthy. I just got the scissors and chopped it off. It was very intentional. And it was what I needed to do. And after that, I became super brave. It was the first step to many more audacious decisions I made in my life and my career that have led to who I am now.‚Äù

April 2024

Beyonc√© returned the tribute while accepting the Innovator Award at the 2024 iHeartRadio Music Awards.

‚ÄúMy husband. My rock. My best friend,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúI love you.‚Äù

She added, ‚ÄúMy three beautiful children who continue to be my inspiration and my biggest blessing.‚Äù
